item.description:
Sounds of Concord and Uno Chicago Grill are hosting a "Dough Raiser" (get it?) on Thursday January 6th.

Have a great lunch or dinner and support SOC at the same time! It's easy. Present one of these coupons with your meal at either the Burlington Mall or Bear Hill Road (Waltham) locations and up to 20% of the cost of your meal will be donated to SOC.

In addition, we will present a Community Sing-Along at the Waltham location at 8:00 pm. Come join us for a fun night of guitars, songs, and singing!

Each person in your party should bring their own coupon. Feel free to print as many as you'd like to share with family and friends!

group.name: Boston Area Acapella Barbershop Quartet/Chorus Singing

item.name: Community Sing-Along at Uno's
